sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>104</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/104</github_url> <message>Use the below script to get all the fields of a table ```javascript var gt = new GlideTable('incident'); gs.print(gt.getFieldNames()); ```</message> <number>TIL0001108</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-21 12:45:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bae1d53c2f8f011051dad5f62799b63e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-27 12:26:18</sys_updated_on> <title>Get all fields of a table</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
